translation: The Fourth Chapter of the Sixth Assembly of the Two Bodhisattvas of the Akṣobhya Tathāgata

source_sentence: 爾時尊者舍利弗作如是念：「世尊今者已說聲聞功德，復願說諸菩薩具足功德。
translation: It was then that Venerable Śāriputra had this thought, Bhagavān, the Bhagavān has now explained the merits of śrāvakas, and he also wishes to explain the merits of bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 一切功德從此出生。」
translation: All merits arise from this.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊知其所念，告舍利弗：「彼佛剎中有無量百千億諸菩薩眾皆來集會。
translation: Knowing what he thought, the Bhagavān then addressed Śāriputra, In that Buddha's buddha-stage, there are measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of bodhisattvas who all come to assemble.

source_sentence: 所有出家菩薩，以佛神力隨所聽聞，皆能領悟受持讀誦。
translation: All the renunciant bodhisattvas were able to comprehend, retain, memorize, and recite whatever they heard because of the Buddha's miraculous powers.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 我於此界說法至少，比不動如來所說法藏，百分、千分、百千分、億百千分、算分、數分、迦羅分、鄔波尼殺曇分亦所不及。
translation: I teach the Dharma in this realm at least as much as the Dharma treasure of the Akṣobhya Tathāgata's teaching, which is less than a hundredth, a thousandth, a hundred thousandth, a hundred millionth, a hundred-thousandth, a hundred-thousandth, a hundred-thousandth, a calculated part, a counting part, a kala

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 此皆不動如來、應、正等覺修菩薩行時發如是願：『願我成佛，彼剎土中所有菩薩，
translation: “These are all the vows of the Buddha Akṣobhya when they practice enlightening beings:

source_sentence: 以我威力隨所聽聞，皆能領悟受持讀誦。』
translation: Because of my authoritative power, whatever I hear, I'll be able to comprehend, retain, and recite it.'

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是諸菩薩由彼如來本願神力，於佛所聞悉能領受諷誦通利。
translation: Because of the miraculous power of that Tathāgata's original vow, these bodhisattvas were able to receive and recite it as well as benefit from what they heard from the Buddha.

source_sentence: 「復次舍利弗！
translation: Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若彼菩薩自心欲樂往異佛土，舉心便至，形服言音善同方俗。
translation: If that bodhisattva wants to happily go to a different buddha land with his own mind, he raises his mind and arrives there, and his form and appearance are the same as those of the laity in terms of speech and sounds.

source_sentence: 於彼如來禮拜供養，聽聞正法善為問難，能事已周還歸佛所。
translation: He venerates and makes offerings to the Tathāgata, listens to the right teaching, asks questions well, and returns to the Buddha after serving him.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 此賢劫中有九百九十六佛當出於世，若有菩薩樂見此如來者，應願生彼不動佛剎。
translation: In this good eon, nine hundred and ninety-six buddhas will appear in the world, and if bodhisattvas delight in seeing these tathāgatas, they should wish to be born in that Akṣobhya Buddha's buddha-stage.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若善男子善女人從此佛剎及餘佛剎於命終後，若已生、若今生、若當生不動如來佛剎中者，
translation: “Furthermore, if a good son or daughter of a virtuous family emerges from these buddha-lands and the other buddha-lands at the end of their life, they will be born in the buddha-lands of the Tathāgata Akṣobhya (i.e., enlightened), who has been born, is born now, and will be born in the future.

source_sentence: 必不信住諸聲聞地。
translation: They mustn't believe in the stages of śrāvakas.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 彼行佛道常遇如來，天魔波旬不得其便，於二乘地永斷相續，必定當得無上菩提，
translation: Those practitioners of the buddha path always meet the Tathāgata, and god Māra Pāpīyān doesn't get an advantage over them. If they permanently end their continuity in the two-vehicle path, they will surely attain unsurpassed enlightenment.

source_sentence: 常在如來諸大集會。
translation: He's always present at the great assemblies of the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 汝應當知，若住不動如來清淨佛剎者，彼諸眾生終不退墮，不可引攝亦不退還，
translation: You should know that if someone abides in the pure buddha-lands of the Akṣobhya Tathāgata, those sentient beings will never regress or fall back.

source_sentence: 住無上菩提，有大勢力不可搖動，永無退轉。
translation: He abides in unsurpassed enlightenment, has great power that can't be shaken and never regresses.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若有善男子善女人於此世界或他世界，若命終後生於彼土，即於生時得如是念：『我已入如來室、住無畏城。』
translation: If there are good men and good women in this world or another world, and if they die and are born in that land, then when they're born, they'll have this thought, 'I've entered the Tathāgata's room and stayed in the fearless city.'

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼諸菩薩所有言議，皆與般若波羅蜜相應，互相遵敬起導師想。
translation: All the words spoken by those bodhisattvas are all associated with the prajñāpāramitā, and they venerate each other and give rise to the idea of a guide.

source_sentence: 「復次舍利弗！
translation: Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼佛剎中諸菩薩眾，在家者少出家者多，皆以佛神力隨所聽聞，即能領悟受持諷誦。
translation: The bodhisattvas in those buddha bases, many of whom are householders and few who leave home, all use the Buddha's miraculous powers to hear whatever they hear so that they can comprehend, retain, and recite it.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若在家菩薩摩訶薩雖不繫念，於法會中隨在方所若坐若立，以佛神力皆能聽聞，
translation: “Furthermore, if a bodhisattva-mahāsattva who lives at home is able to hear the Teaching through the spiritual power of the Buddha even though he is not absorbed in it, whether seated or standing wherever he may be in the assembly.

source_sentence: 領悟受持讀誦通利。
translation: He comprehends, retains, recites, and penetrates it.

source_sentence: 彼出家菩薩亦復如是，諸在異方乃至諷誦無別。
translation: That renunciant bodhisattva is likewise, and there's no distinction between those who are in different directions or even those who recite it.

source_sentence: 是諸菩薩捨身受身，於所聞經終不忘失，於諸佛土隨願受生。
translation: These bodhisattvas abandon body and receive body, never forgetting the sūtras they hear, and are born in the buddha-lands as they wish.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼亦是不動如來本願功德之所莊嚴。
translation: They are also adorned by the merit of the Akṣobhya Tathāgata's original vow.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若菩薩於一生中欲見無量百千億那由他諸佛者，應當願生不動如來之所。
translation: If a bodhisattva wants to see measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of buddhas in one lifetime, he should wish to be born in the place of Akṣobhya Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 若菩薩於彼生已，即見無量諸佛種諸善根，復能為無數百千眾生演說法要，
translation: “Furthermore, the enlightening beings who are born there see infinite buddhas planting roots of goodness and can teach the truth to countless millions of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 令諸眾生增長善根。
translation: It causes sentient beings to grow good roots.

source_sentence: 舍利弗，此賢劫中諸佛世尊當出於世，若諸菩薩以衣服飲食臥具醫藥種種資具供養如來，
translation: Śāriputra, the buddhas and world-honored ones of this good eon will appear in the world. If bodhisattvas offer clothing, food, bedding, medicine, and various necessities to the Tathāgata,

source_sentence: 便即出家。
translation: He then left home.

source_sentence: 既出家已，於諸佛所淨修梵行。
translation: Having renounced the householder’s life, he practiced pure and genuine austerity in the presence of the buddhas.

source_sentence: 以此善根，方餘菩薩於不動如來之所，於一生中與波羅蜜相應，所有福聚百分不及一、千分不及一，
translation: Because of these roots of goodness, the other bodhisattvas at Akṣobhya Tathāgata’s place are not equal to a hundredth or even less than one-thousandth [percent] of the accumulation of merit that is associated with the pāramitā in their lifetime.

source_sentence: 算分、迦羅分、數分、喻分、鄔波尼殺曇分亦不能及。
translation: The calculation part, the kalala part, the number part, the metaphor part, and the upanisaic part can't reach them either.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 此亦不動如來清淨佛剎功德莊嚴。
translation: This also doesn't move the Tathāgata's pure buddha-stage adornment of merit.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若有菩薩從此世界或餘世界於壽終後，若已生、現生、當生不動如來佛剎者，
translation: “Furthermore, if there is a bodhisattva who follows this world or another world to the buddha-field of the Tathāgata Akṣobhya at the end of his life—whether he has already arisen, will arise in the present life, or will arise in the future.

source_sentence: 一切皆得不退轉位。
translation: All of them will attain the stage of nonretrogression.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 彼佛剎中天魔波旬不為障礙，亦無魔業之所嬈亂。
translation: In that buddha-stage, the god Māra Pāpīyān isn't an obstruction, and there's no demonic activity that disturbs it.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 譬如毒蛇，神呪所伏不能為害，一切諸蟲見彼毒蛇亦無憂懼。
translation: It's like a poisonous snake that can't be harmed by a magic spell, and all the insects who see it have no sorrow or fear.

source_sentence: 然此毒蛇雖無毒害，由本業故受此蛇身，故名毒蛇。
translation: Although this venomous snake has no poisonous or harmful effects, it is called a venomous snake due to the fact that by virtue of its original action it receives the body of this snake.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼魔波旬亦復如是，由不動如來往修菩薩行時本願善根如是迴向：『願我當證無上菩提，
translation: Māra the Bad is also like this: when the Buddha Akṣobhya was cultivating enlightening practices in the past, he originally vowed to dedicate his roots of goodness in this way:

source_sentence: 調伏諸魔不為障惱，彼諸菩薩、聲聞、凡夫乃至三千大千世界亦不為障惱。』
translation: He subdues Māra and doesn't become an obstruction, and those bodhisattvas, śrāvakas, worldlings, and even the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds don't become an obstruction.'

source_sentence: 然由先業所感受此魔身，生彼天中而自悔責，無始故業獲此身名，雖得自在常生厭患。
translation: However, as a result of their past actions, they felt this demon's body and were born in that heaven and repented for themselves. Because of their beginningless actions, they got the name of this body because even though they had attained sovereignty, they always gave rise to disillusionment.

source_sentence: 於彼如來說法之時，諸魔眷屬常預聽聞聞已心淨，於聲聞眾而生愛樂：『云何當得住於寂靜少欲知足？』
translation: When the Tathāgata teaches the Dharma, the Māra's retinues always foresee that their minds are purified after hearing it and become delighted with the śrāvakas, saying, 'How will they be able to abide in quiescence with few desires and contentment?'

source_sentence: 彼諸魔眾常起出家之心而無障礙之想故。
translation: It's because those Māras always give rise to the thought of leaving home and have no obstructive thoughts.

source_sentence: 彼國中聲聞菩薩及凡夫眾，皆由彼佛往昔精勤弘誓威力得安樂住。
translation: In that country, śrāvakas, bodhisattvas, and ordinary people all attained peaceful abiding because of the Buddha's past diligence and great vow power.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 此亦不動佛剎殊勝莊嚴。」
translation: This is also the extraordinary adornment of the Akṣobhya Buddha's buddha-stage.

source_sentence: 時舍利弗白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Śāriputra then said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有善男子善女人，以七寶滿三千大千世界，持用布施願生彼國。
translation: Suppose there are good men and good women who fill 3,000 great one-thousand worlds with the seven treasures and give them to be born in that country.

source_sentence: 由茲行願，此善男子善女人終不退墮聲聞、辟支佛地，從一佛剎至一佛剎，
translation: Because of these practices and vows, these good men and good women will never regress from the stages of śrāvakas and pratyekbuddhas, going from one buddha-stage to another.

source_sentence: 歷事供養諸佛如來，於諸佛所聽聞正法，雖未證得無上菩提，而能見彼無量百千乃至億那由他百千諸佛，
translation: They served and honored all buddha-tathāgatas, heard the true teaching from all buddhas, and though they had not yet attained unexcelled awakening, yet they were able to see innumerable hundreds of thousands or billions of those buddhas.

source_sentence: 於諸佛所種諸善根。
translation: He plants good roots in the buddhas.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若善男子善女人由此方便，以七寶滿三千大千世界持用布施，由茲善捨往生彼國。」
translation: If good men and good women use this method to present seven treasures that fill the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds with a thousand worlds, then they'll be able to abandon it and go to be born in another country.

source_sentence: 佛告舍利弗：「如是如是，彼善生善往，如是諸菩薩摩訶薩滿彼剎中。
translation: The Buddha told Śāriputra, So it is, so it is, these good births and good deeds, and so are the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas filling those buddhas.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 譬如金礦精加鑄鍊，除去砂礫唯有真金，造諸飾好嚴身之具。
translation: It's like when gold ore is mined and refined, except for the sand and gravel, there's only genuine gold that's made into beautifully decorated and adorned body implements.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼佛剎中菩薩摩訶薩，住於真實亦復如是。
translation: So it is with the bodhisattva Mahāsattva in that buddha-stage who abides in reality.

source_sentence: 然彼菩薩摩訶薩清淨集會，汝今應知。
translation: Still, that pure assembly of bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas, you should now know.

source_sentence: 「復次舍利弗！
translation: Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼佛剎中所有菩薩，若已生、若現生、若當生，如是菩薩皆行一行。
translation: All the bodhisattvas in those buddha bases, whether they've arisen, are arising now, or will arise in the future, such bodhisattvas all practice one practice.

source_sentence: 所謂住如來行。
translation: It's called abiding in the Tathāgata's practice.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 云何如來行？
translation: What's the Tathāgata's practice?

source_sentence: 所謂超過聲聞、辟支佛地。
translation: They're called beyond the stages of śrāvakas and pratyekbuddhas.

source_sentence: 言行一行者是彼假名。
translation: When it's called the practice of one practice, it's a nominal name for that.

source_sentence: 是故舍利弗！
translation: Therefore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩樂行一行者，應當願生彼佛剎土。
translation: If a bodhisattva Mahāsattva delights in one practice, he should wish to be born in that Buddha's buddha-stage land.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 我所授記得不退轉菩薩摩訶薩，此輩應生不動佛所。
translation: This group of bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas who remember the nonretrogressing bodhisattva that I've taught should be born in the place of Akṣobhya Buddha.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是諸菩薩生彼佛剎者，我不捨離。
translation: Those bodhisattvas who are born in that buddha-stage won't part with me.

source_sentence: 譬如剎利灌頂大王，有敵國來欲侵財位。
translation: It's like a great king consecrated by the kṣatriya king who comes from an enemy country and wants to steal his wealth.

source_sentence: 王既聞已作是思惟：『我之妃后愛子不堪禦敵，及諸財寶收入宮城，不為怨敵之所侵害，
translation: Having heard this, the king thought: My queen and my beloved son cannot resist an enemy. As well as their wealth and treasures, they will keep the royal city secure and not be attacked by an enemy.

source_sentence: 王之國祚安靜無虞，威震強敵不憂災難。』
translation: The king's throne is peaceful and has no fear, and his powerful enemies don't worry about disaster.'

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 我不捨離諸菩薩者亦復如是，如彼王之寶物愛子妃后，修菩薩行者應如是知。
translation: So it is with someone who doesn't abandon the bodhisattvas, just like that king's treasured queen and princely queen, and those who cultivate the bodhisattva practice should thus know.

source_sentence: 彼佛剎中無有畏懼猶如宮城，彼敵王者即魔波旬，於菩薩行人勤為障礙，
translation: In those buddha-lands there was no fear like a palace city. That king of enemies, Māra Pāpīyān, became an obstruction to the bodhisattva’s practitioners.

source_sentence: 如彼灌頂大王不被怨敵之所侵擾。
translation: It's like that consecration of the great king who isn't harmed by enemies.

source_sentence: 如來亦復如是，不為天魔之所擾惱。
translation: So it is with the Tathāgata, who isn't disturbed by heavenly Māra.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 譬如有人畏於債主遠適邊國，不為債主及於他人之所陵奪。
translation: It's like a person who fears the creditor's distant destination in a border country and isn't attacked by the creditor or another person.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 由路遠險絕，債主家人不能達彼。
translation: Because the road was so long and dangerous, the creditor's family couldn't reach him.

source_sentence: 彼諸菩薩生妙喜國者，波旬路絕亦復如是。
translation: When those bodhisattvas give rise to the land of Marvelous Joy, it's likewise when Pāpīyān's path is cut off.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 此三千大千世界天魔波旬，常為菩薩聲聞作諸障礙。
translation: These god Māra Pāpīyān of the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds always create obstacles for bodhisattvas and śrāvakas.

source_sentence: 妙喜剎中諸天魔眾不為魔業，彼諸菩薩若已生、現生、當生，常無恐怖。
translation: The gods and Māras in the Marvelous Joy Buddha's buddha aren't demonic, and those bodhisattvas are always fearless if they have been born, are born now, or will be born.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 由彼如來本行菩薩道時，所有善根如是迴向：『我證無上正等覺時，彼天魔眾不為障惱及作魔事。』
translation: Because when the Tathāgata was practicing the bodhisattva path in the past, he thus dedicates his good roots to them: 'When I realize unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, those gods and Māra won't be obstructed or do anything demonic.'

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 譬如丈夫善服毒藥能使消化，方為食事無有諸毒。
translation: It's like a man who well takes poisonous medicine that can make it digestible and then feeds on it without any poison.

source_sentence: 彼剎天魔亦復如是，常加利益不為損害。
translation: So it is with the gods and Māras of those buddha-lands, who always provide benefit and not harm.

source_sentence: 舍利弗，彼佛剎土成就如是無量功德。」
translation: Śāriputra, that Buddha's buddha-lands have accomplished such measureless merit.

source_sentence: 爾時舍利弗作是思惟：「我今欲見彼佛世界不動如來、應、正等覺及聲聞眾。」
translation: It was then that Śāriputra had this thought, Now, I want to see the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One and the śrāvakas who aren't moving in that buddha world.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊知舍利弗心之所念，則以神力不起于座皆令得見。
translation: Knowing what Śāriputra thought in his mind, the Bhagavān then used his supernormal powers to get up from his seat and make them all see it.

source_sentence: 告舍利弗言：「汝今見不？」
translation: He told Śāriputra, Do you see it now?

source_sentence: 答言：「已見。」

translation: After the true teaching ceases, there's a great ray of light that illuminates the ten directions, and the earth shakes and produces a great sound.

source_sentence: 然彼非天魔之所能壞，亦非如來及聲聞眾而自沈隱。
translation: However, they can't be destroyed by gods or Māra, nor are the Tathāgatas and śrāvakas themselves submerged in seclusion.

source_sentence: 但由彼時人少有聽聞多無欲樂，能說法者皆悉遠之。
translation: It's simply because those people at the time had few listeners and were mostly devoid of desire and pleasure, and those who could teach the Dharma were all far removed from them.

source_sentence: 既於正法寡聞轉增不信，不信增長則無精勤。
translation: Since there are few hearers of the right teaching who increasingly lack faith, and those who lack faith increase, then there's no exertion.

source_sentence: 知法比丘自當退靜，觀無樂欲不復弘宣，彼佛微言漸當隱沒。」
translation: Knowing the teaching, the monk himself will retreat and quietly observe that there's no pleasure and desire and no longer proclaim it, and those Buddha's subtle words will gradually disappear.

translation: The Sixth Chapter on the Causes and Conditions for Rebirth

source_sentence: 爾時尊者舍利弗白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that Venerable Śāriputra said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩以何因緣善根之力，於彼佛剎而得受生？」
translation: By the power of the good roots, what causes and conditions does a bodhisattva Mahāsattva attain birth in that buddha-stage?

source_sentence: 佛告舍利弗：「若菩薩摩訶薩欲生妙喜世界者，應學不動如來往昔行菩薩行，
translation: The Buddha said to Śāriputra: If great enlightening beings wish to give rise to the world of sublime joy, they should train themselves in the practice of enlightening beings as described by Akṣobhya Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 發弘誓心願生其國，如是行願能作因緣生彼佛剎。
translation: They give rise to a great vow to wish to be born in that country, and these practices and vows can create the causes and conditions for being born in that buddha-stage.

source_sentence: 「復次舍利弗！
translation: Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩行檀波羅蜜時，以此相應善根迴向無上菩提，願與不動如來共相會遇，
translation: “When great enlightening beings practice the transcendent giving, they dedicate their roots of goodness associated with these roots to unexcelled enlightenment, wishing to associate with the Buddha Akṣobhya.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 以此因緣當生彼界。
translation: Because of these causes and conditions, they'll be born in that realm.

source_sentence: 如是菩薩摩訶薩行尸波羅蜜，乃至般若波羅蜜亦復如是。
translation: Thus, the bodhisattva Mahāsattva's practice of the perfection of morality and even the perfection of wisdom are likewise.

source_sentence: 「復次舍利弗！
translation: Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 不動如來光明普照三千大千佛之剎土，願於來世當見此光證無上覺，因見光已成大菩提，
translation: “Furthermore, the Buddha Akṣobhya’s light illumines as many buddha-lands as there are in the ten directions; wishing to see this light and realize supreme enlightenment in the future, having seen it, they attain great enlightenment.

source_sentence: 復以身光遍滿世界，舍利弗！
translation: Again, he pervades the world with his body's light, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 菩薩以是因緣當生彼土。
translation: Because of these causes and conditions, the bodhisattva will be born in that land.

source_sentence: 「復次舍利弗！
translation: Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼不動如來應正等覺諸聲聞眾無量無邊，願我當見，見已起如是行，證佛菩提。
translation: That Akṣobhya Tathāgata should be perfectly enlightened, and the number of śrāvakas are immeasurable and limitless, so may I see him, who has seen such a practice and realized the Buddha's enlightenment.

source_sentence: 證菩提時，亦有如是無量無數諸聲聞眾。
translation: When they realize enlightenment, there are also such an immeasurable and countless number of śrāvakas.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 以是因緣故，菩薩摩訶薩於彼佛剎而得受生。
translation: Because of these causes and conditions, the bodhisattva Mahāsattva was born in that Buddha's buddha-stage.

source_sentence: 「復次舍利弗！
translation: Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼佛剎中菩薩摩訶薩無量無邊，我當欲見此諸菩薩，行禪定行願當隨學，
translation: “The great enlightening beings in those buddha-lands are infinite and boundless: I should see these enlightening beings, carrying out the practice of meditation, wishing to follow them.

source_sentence: 與諸菩薩處處結集，同學同乘同俱究竟。
translation: He's assembled with the bodhisattvas everywhere, and his fellow students are all in the same vehicle as him.

source_sentence: 願當會遇欲求圓滿大慈悲者，欲求菩提及沙門者，捨離二乘心者，安住真實空性者，
translation: May they meet those who want to perfect great compassion, those who want to seek enlightenment and become ascetics, those who abandon the minds of the two-vehicle teachings, and those who abide in true emptiness.

source_sentence: 於佛如來一切智性及法僧名號念住相續者。
translation: He's mindful of all the buddhas, tathāgatas, omniscience, Dharma, and saṃgha names as they continue to abide.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若善男子善女人聞是色類菩薩名者，於彼佛剎當得受生；
translation: Good men and good women who hear the names of these bodhisattvas of all colors will be born in those buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 何況與般若波羅蜜相應善根，迴向不動如來應正等覺。
translation: How much more so when it's associated with the good roots associated with the prajñāpāramitā, which are directed back to the Tathāgata Akṣobhya and Worthy of Correct Enlightenment.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 以是因緣，是人於彼佛土決定當生。
translation: Because of these causes and conditions, this person will surely be born in that Buddha's land.

source_sentence: 「復次舍利弗！
translation: Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩願生彼佛剎者，於東方無量世界諸佛如來說微妙法及聲聞眾，
translation: “Furthermore, if great enlightening beings wish to be born in those buddha-lands, the Buddhas and buddha-tathāgatas of infinite worlds in the east will teach the fine teachings and the assembly of śrāvakas.

source_sentence: 應以其像隨念在前，願我當證菩提說微妙法，及聲聞眾皆如彼佛。
translation: Because his image is in front of us, let me realize enlightenment and teach the subtle Dharma, and all the śrāvakas are like those buddhas.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是諸菩薩應修三種隨念善根，願與一切眾生平等共習，以此善根迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: These bodhisattvas should cultivate three kinds of good roots of mindfulness, wishing to be cultivated equally with all sentient beings and dedicate these good roots back to unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 如是菩薩迴向善根無有限量。
translation: Thus, the bodhisattva's dedication of good roots has no limit.

source_sentence: 假使一切眾生各持一器量等虛空，作如是言：『丈夫！
translation: Suppose all sentient beings each hold a container equal in size to space and say, 'Man!

source_sentence: 彼之善根分與於我。』
translation: They share their good roots with me.'

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 此諸善根若有色相，給與眾生皆滿其器各各持去，而彼善根亦無窮盡。
translation: If these good roots of goodness have form and characteristics, they're given to sentient beings who fill their containers with each other and carry them away, but those good roots are also inexhaustible.

source_sentence: 以迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，無有限量不可移轉故。
translation: It's because they dedicate themselves back to unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment without limit and can't be moved.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼三隨念所成迴向一切種智，以此善根三寶隨轉。
translation: These three kinds of knowledge that are directed back to all kinds of cognition formed by following mindfulness, and these good roots are followed by the three treasures.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若有菩薩成此善根，應知不墮一切惡趣，而能摧伏波旬及諸魔眾，於彼彼佛剎隨樂受生。
translation: If there are bodhisattvas who have accomplished these good roots, they should know that they won't fall into any bad destinies and can subdue the pārājikas and Māras and be born in those buddha bases as they like.

source_sentence: 乃至南西北方四維上下亦復如是，皆得隨願受生。
translation: It's likewise with the four directions in the south, north, west, and up, and they'll all be born according to their wishes.

source_sentence: 是故菩薩摩訶薩於此隨念善根應當積集，彼積集已應迴向不動如來，故於彼剎當得受生。
translation: Therefore, the bodhisattva Mahāsattva should accumulate these good roots of mindfulness here, and after accumulating them, he should dedicate them back to the Akṣobhya Tathāgata, so he'll be born in that buddha.

source_sentence: 「復次舍利弗！
translation: Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 不動如來佛剎功德廣大莊嚴，於無量佛剎中彼皆無有。
translation: Akṣobhya Tathāgata Buddha's buddha-lands are vastly adorned by the virtues of these buddha-lands, and they don't exist in measureless buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 是故菩薩摩訶薩應當發如是心，我以此善根願當見彼土，彼土莊嚴願當攝受，
translation: Therefore, great enlightening beings should make such determinations: “With these roots of goodness I vow to see those lands; the adornments of those lands I vow to embrace them.

source_sentence: 亦願當見彼諸菩薩。
translation: I also wish to see those bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 以此因緣，菩薩當生彼國。
translation: Because of these causes and conditions, the bodhisattva will be born in that country.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩願生彼佛剎者，應發增上樂欲之心。
translation: A bodhisattva-mahāsattva who wishes to be born in that buddha-stage should give rise to the mind of increasingly delighted desire.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若善男子善女人發增上心，我皆與記於彼佛剎而得受生。
translation: If good men and good women give rise to a superior mind, I'll give them the prediction that they'll be born in that buddha-stage.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 譬如有城，無有樓閣園林池沼，亦無象馬遊行之處。
translation: It's like a city that has no towers, gardens, forests, ponds, or swamps, and doesn't have places where elephants and horses wander.

source_sentence: 彼城之王雖有力安處，而城無樓閣諸功德故，則非莊嚴。
translation: Although the king of that city is powerful and peaceful, it doesn't have a tower or pavilion because of its virtues, so it isn't adorned.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 我此佛剎亦復如是，無彼功德故則非嚴飾。
translation: This buddha-stage of mine is also like this: because it does not have the qualities of those buddhas, it is not adorned.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 我此剎中若有如是功德莊嚴，則如不動如來佛剎嚴勝。
translation: If there were such an adornment of merit in my buddha-stage, it would be like the adornment of the Akṣobhya Tathāgata's buddha-stage.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩願當攝受清淨佛剎者，應如不動如來往修菩薩行，植眾德本嚴淨佛剎已，
translation: “If great enlightening beings wish to embrace buddha-lands of purity, they should cultivate enlightening practice like the Buddha Akṣobhya and plant roots of virtue in buddha-lands that are inherently pure.

source_sentence: 及當如是攝取功德。
translation: It's also the merit of thus taking in.

source_sentence: 「復次舍利弗！
translation: Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 如我今時得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，調伏無量眾生，於二乘道皆獲果證，
translation: “Furthermore, just as I have now attained unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, disciplined innumerable sentient beings and realized their fruit on the path of individual liberation,

source_sentence: 及我聲聞所調伏者悉皆積聚，方彼如來諸聲聞眾，百分不及一、千分不及一，
translation: Those who are disciplined by me śrāvakas and those disciplined by them all accumulate. The assembly of the śrāvakas of the Tathāgatas is not even one-thousandth as great as that, or less than one-thousandth as great.

source_sentence: 百千分、億百千分、數分、算分、喻分、鄔波尼殺曇分亦不及一。
translation: A hundred-thousandth, a hundred-thousandth, a hundred-thousandth, a hundred-thousandth, a hundred-thousandth, a hundred-thousandth, a hundred-thousandth, a hundred-thousandth, a hundred-thousandth, a hundred-thousandth, a hundred-thousandth

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 由數無量故；
translation: Because the number is immeasurable.

source_sentence: 若言解脫則無有異。
translation: If it's called liberation, then there's no difference.

source_sentence: 且止斯事。
translation: Let's stop this matter.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼彌勒如來當出於世，諸聲聞眾及彼調伏所餘聲聞，以方不動如來聲聞之數，
translation: That Maitreya Tathāgata was about to appear in the world. All the śrāvakas and all the other disciples who had been disciplined by him were as many śrāvakas as there were in the assembly, but they did not move even a little bit from that sphere of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 不及之分如上應知。
translation: The parts that aren't equal should be known as above.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 由彼如來於一說法，善能調伏無量有情。
translation: Because that Tathāgata teaches the Dharma in one teaching, he's able to skillfully tame measureless sentient beings.

source_sentence: 然彼世尊之所攝受，無有能知其數量者。
translation: However, there's no one who can know the number of those received by the Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 我之聲聞及彌勒如來諸聲聞眾，乃至賢劫諸佛世尊所有聲聞，及彼聲聞當所調伏餘聲聞眾，
translation: My disciples and the disciples of Maitreya, as well as all the other disciples who will be disciplined by those disciples.

source_sentence: 彼皆積聚比不動如來諸聲聞眾，百分不及一，乃至鄔波尼殺曇分亦不及一。
translation: They all accumulate a hundred parts less than the number of śrāvakas who aren't like the Akṣobhya Tathāgata, and even up to the point where they don't equal one part of Upanisaṭṭha.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 其數多故；
translation: Their number is great because they are numerous.

source_sentence: 解脫無異故。」
translation: It's because liberation is not different.

source_sentence: 時舍利弗白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Śāriputra then said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如我解佛所說義者，應知彼阿羅漢剎非愚夫剎。
translation: As I understand the meaning of what the Buddha teaches, you should know that those arhat bases aren't foolish bases.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 彼佛剎中阿羅漢多故。」
translation: It's because there are so many arhats in those buddha bases.

source_sentence: 佛告舍利弗：「如是如是，如汝所說，彼佛剎中多漏盡阿羅漢故。
translation: The Buddha told Śāriputra, So it is, so it is, as you say, because there are many arhats who have ended the contaminants in those buddha bases.

source_sentence: 復次舍利弗！
translation: Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 此三千大千世界星宿數量，不如彼佛聲聞眾多。
translation: The number of stars and constellations in these 3,000 great one-thousand worlds isn't as numerous as those buddhas and śrāvakas there.

source_sentence: 由彼如來於一說法，無量有情得阿羅漢。
translation: Because that Tathāgata teaches the Dharma in one teaching, measureless sentient beings attain arhatship.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 此三千大千世界星宿猶有數量，彼一一會，無量有情得阿羅漢故，諸會聲聞無有數量。
translation: These 3,000 great one-thousand worlds of stars and constellations are still numerous, but each assembly has an immeasurable number of śrāvakas in its assemblies because measureless sentient beings attain arhatship.

source_sentence: 「復次舍利弗！
translation: Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼剎天人殖眾善本，餘界人天縱以天眼亦不能見。
translation: Those buddha gods and humans cultivate many good roots, but people in other realms can't see them even if they have the divine eye.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 假令餘界諸天及人，往彼剎中善男子善女人所，盡其天眼亦不得見。
translation: Suppose gods and humans in other realms go to good men and good women in those buddhas, but they can't see them until their divine eyes are exhausted.

source_sentence: 若人聞此功德稱揚法門，聞已受持讀誦通利，彼善男子等皆於不動如來往昔行菩薩行時皆已見聞，
translation: “Furthermore, if someone hears this teaching of the Dharma that is praised for its virtue and who retains it after hearing it, he or she will be endowed with insight. Such sons of a virtuous family have all seen and heard what the Buddha Akṣobhya had heard in the past while they were engaged in the practice of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 是故聞此法門即得信心清淨。
translation: Therefore, when someone hears this teaching, they'll attain purity of faith.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 東方一切世界諸剎土中，若菩薩乘人或聲聞乘人，於此法門讀誦通利者，
translation: In all the buddha-lands in all the worlds of the east, if there are bodhisattva-vehicle or śrāvaka-vehicle people who recite and penetrate this teaching,

source_sentence: 其數甚多。
translation: There were so many of them.

source_sentence: 彼諸菩薩及聲聞人，由願力故於不動剎中，若已生、現生、當生，唯除不退菩薩，
translation: Because of the power of their vows, those bodhisattvas and śrāvakas at Akṣobhya Buddha’s buddha-field are born in the past, will be born in the present, and will be born in the future.

source_sentence: 由彼菩薩於諸剎中當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提故。
translation: It's because that bodhisattva will attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment in the buddhas.

source_sentence: 南西北方四維上下亦復如是。
translation: So it is with the south, west, north, four directions, and up and down in the same way.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼不動如來於妙喜世界及他方剎土，在菩薩等乘中而為上首。
translation: That Akṣobhya Tathāgata is the leader of the bodhisattva vehicle and so forth in the world of Marvelous Joy and other buddha lands.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若有善男子善女人聞不動如來功德法門，善能受持讀誦通利，願生彼剎者，
translation: “Furthermore, if there are sons and daughters of a virtuous family who hear the Teaching of the Buddha Akṣobhya and are well able to receive, retain, recite, and penetrate it, wishing to be born in that buddha-field.

source_sentence: 乃至命終，不動如來常為護念，不使諸魔及魔眷屬退轉其心。
translation: Up to the end of his life, the Akṣobhya Tathāgata always guards his thoughts and doesn't cause Māra or their retinues to turn their minds back.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 應知是善男子或善女人乃至無上菩提，無有退轉之怖，亦無水火刀杖惡獸毒蟲之所損害，
translation: You should know that these good men or good women, up to the unsurpassed enlightenment, have no fear of retreating and no harm from water, fire, swords, sticks, dangerous animals, poisonous insects, or beasts.

source_sentence: 亦不為人非人等之所怖畏。
translation: They won't be frightened by people or non-people.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 由不動如來常加護念，於彼佛剎當受生故。
translation: It's because the Akṣobhya Tathāgata always guards his mindfulness, and he'll be born in that buddha-stage.

source_sentence: 「舍利弗！
translation: “O Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 譬如日輪雖復遙遠，與閻浮提眾生而作光明。
translation: It's like the sun that shines brightly even though it's distant from the wheel of the sun and creates a light with the sentient beings in Jambudvīpa.

source_sentence: 不動如來亦復如是，雖在遙遠，能與他界諸菩薩眾而作光明。
translation: The Akṣobhya Tathāgata is also like this: even though distant, he can give his light to the assembly of enlightening beings in other realms.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 譬如比丘有天眼者，能見遠方諸善惡色。
translation: It's like a monk who has the divine eye and can see good and bad forms from afar.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！

translation: If there are purely believing men and women who praise this teaching for its merits, they should explain it for others at the right time.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！

source_sentence: 舍利弗！

translation: There are kings, princes, and ministers who have previously attained it.

translation: The Buddha told Śāriputra, So it is with the merits of those buddhas' teachings, which are first attained by bodhisattvas.

translation: These bodhisattvas will not regress, and if they hear this teaching, they'll surely be able to retain it, recite it, and thoroughly benefit from it, and diligently cultivate the true nature of enlightenment for the sake of unsurpassed enlightenment.

source_sentence: 舍利弗白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Śāriputra said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若諸菩薩欲住不退地者，聞此稱讚法門，應當受持讀誦通利。
translation: If bodhisattvas want to abide in the stage of nonretrogression, they hear this extolled teaching and should memorize it, recite it, and thoroughly benefit from it.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩住此法門，於法性中當不退轉。」
translation: When bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas abide in this teaching, they won't regress from the Dharma-nature.

source_sentence: 佛告舍利弗：「假使有人終以金寶滿閻浮提持用布施，冀聞此法終亦不聞。
translation: The Buddha told Śāriputra, Suppose someone were to end up giving alms with a gold treasure filled Jambudvīpa and wishing to hear this teaching, but they won't hear it at all.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

translation: It's because these meritorious dharmas aren't held by sentient beings with little merit.

source_sentence: 復次舍利弗！
translation: Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若聲聞乘人聞此功德法門受持讀誦，為無上菩提及真如相應故精勤修習，
translation: If śrāvakas hear this teaching of merit, they preserve it and recite it. Because it is associated with the supreme enlightenment and true suchness, they diligently practice it.

source_sentence: 彼於後身當得成就，或於二生補處、或復三生，終不超過，當成正覺。
translation: In the latter body, they'll attain accomplishment, or they'll become perfectly enlightened either in the second birth as a replacement or three more births, and they'll never exceed it.

source_sentence: 彼若聞此稱讚法門讀誦通利，復為無量百千眾生開示演說。
translation: If they hear this extolled teaching of the Dharma and recite it with penetrating benefits, they'll also reveal and explain it for measureless hundreds of thousands of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 如轉輪王以先業感七寶見前。
translation: It's like a wheel-turning king who causes seven treasures to appear before him because of his prior actions.

source_sentence: 不動如來亦復如是，以本願力，我今說此功德法門。
translation: The Akṣobhya Tathāgata is also like this, and by the power of my original vow, I'll now explain this meritorious dharma-gate.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若諸菩薩摩訶薩於此稱讚法門，若已聞若當聞者，彼皆由不動如來往昔行菩薩行時慈悲願力，
translation: If all the great enlightening beings praise this teaching, and if they have heard it or will hear it, it is because of the power of compassion and vows of the Buddha Akṣobhya’s past practice of enlightening beings.

translation: Perhaps in the good eon, the buddhas and world-honored ones will preach this teaching as predicted by the Bhagavān, just as I'll explain it now, without increasing or decreasing its number.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是故菩薩摩訶薩欲速證無上菩提者，於此功德稱讚法門，應當受持讀誦通利為他廣說。
translation: Therefore, if bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas want to quickly realize unsurpassed enlightenment, they should memorize, recite, penetrate, and explain this teaching of merit and praise it extensively for others.

source_sentence: 「復次舍利弗！
translation: Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若善男子善女人為求此法門故，於彼村落城邑，聽聞受持讀誦通利。
translation: If there are good men and good women who seek this teaching, they'll hear it, retain it, recite it, and penetrate it in those villages and cities for the sake of seeking it.

source_sentence: 雖出家菩薩居白衣家，我說無過，亦隨聽住。
translation: Even though a renunciant bodhisattva lives in a white-robed house, there's nothing wrong with what I say, and he follows my example.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 彼善男子善女人於命終後，欲令此法當不隱沒。
translation: Good men and good women, after their lives end, they want to keep this teaching from being concealed.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若彼村邑在於遙遠，是諸菩薩亦當應往，及住彼中，受持讀誦開示演說。
translation: If that village or town is far away, the bodhisattvas should also go there and stay there, memorize it, recite it, teach it, and explain it.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼善男子善女人於已流布稱讚法門，或於他人有是經卷，應可詣彼而書寫之。
translation: Good men and good women praise the teachings that have been disseminated, or if they have these sūtras in other people's hands, they should go there and write them down.

source_sentence: 彼人若有願求，汝當斷食，或使經行若坐若立等，應曲隨教命書寫是經。
translation: If that person has a vow and asks for it, you must cut off food or cause them to walk, sit, stand, and so forth, and write this sūtra down as instructed.

source_sentence: 若於彼村求不能得，應詣隣境書寫，受持讀誦通利，復為他人開示演說。
translation: If someone asks for something in that village but can't get it, they should go to the neighboring place, write it, memorize it, recite it, and share its benefits, and then teach it to others.

source_sentence: 若往餘方勤求不獲，彼人應發如是誓心：『我於無上菩提不應生於退轉之相。
translation: If someone goes to another place and diligently seeks it but doesn't obtain it, they should make this vow, 'I shouldn't give rise to the characteristic of retrogression in unsurpassed enlightenment.

source_sentence: 由我已聞不動如來法門名號，是人於我欲為利益令我聽聞。』
translation: Because I've heard the name of the Akṣobhya Tathāgata's teaching, this person wants to benefit me and cause me to hear it.'

source_sentence: 或由四大天王、釋提桓因等當勤加護，令諸法師宣揚此法。
translation: Perhaps it's because the four great celestial kings and Śakra Devānām-Indra will diligently protect them and cause the masters of the Dharma to proclaim this teaching.

source_sentence: 及彼菩薩本業成熟，四天王等威加策進，令諸菩薩而得聽聞。」
translation: When those bodhisattvas' original actions are ripened, the four heavenly kings and others with authority and strength make them hear it.

translation: If rain and hailstorms are a disaster in the country, an unseasonable thunderbolt or any other kind of fearsome event occurs.

source_sentence: 彼善男子善女人等，應當專念不動如來及稱名號，是諸災害皆得消除。
translation: Good men and good women, they should concentrate on the Akṣobhya Tathāgata and his name, and these calamities will all be removed.

source_sentence: 由彼如來往昔弘濟百千諸龍解脫眾苦，又由慈悲本願誠諦不虛，迴向善根要期圓滿故，
translation: Because the Tathāgata had formerly liberated hundreds of thousands of dragons from suffering, and because his original vow of kindness and compassion was sincere and not false, he dedicates his roots of goodness back to their essential fulfillment.

translation: Those bodhisattvas who want to realize unsurpassed enlightenment in their present body should cultivate the practice of vows like the Akṣobhya Tathāgata.

translation: Few bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas can thus fully cultivate the pure bases and will purify them like the Akṣobhya Tathāgata, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼諸菩薩皆當證得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，而於佛性及一切智、攝受佛國悉皆同等。
translation: Those bodhisattvas will all realize unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, and they'll all be equal to the buddha-nature, omniscience, and the taking in of the Buddha's land.

translation: Bodhisattvas and śrāvakas aren't without superiority or inferiority, but there's no difference in liberation.

translation: It was then that the gods of the desire realm and the Brahmā gods all bowed to the Tathāgata with their palms together and three times called out, Namo, the Akṣobhya Tathāgata, Arhat, and Completely Awakened One are very rare.

source_sentence: 又歸命此界釋迦牟尼如來、應、正等覺，善能說彼稱讚法門。
translation: I also pay homage to the Tathāgata, Arhat, and Completely Awakened One of this world, Śākyamuni, who can skillfully explain the praiseworthy teaching.

source_sentence: 爾時欲界諸天以曼陀羅花及諸天香以散佛上，所散香華於虛空中合而成蓋；
translation: At that time the gods of the realm of desire scattered flowers of maṇḍala and heavenly fragrances over the Buddha. The fragrant flowers they scattered combined to form a canopy in the sky.

source_sentence: 復以諸天花香遙散彼佛以為供養。
translation: They also scattered heavenly flowers and incense from a distance to offer them to the Buddha as an offering.

source_sentence: 時天帝釋作如是念：「我此四眾及欲界諸天，皆欲見彼不動如來、應、正等覺。」
translation: Śakra Devānām-Indra then had this thought, These four groups of people and the gods in the desire realm all want to see that Akṣobhya Tathāgata, Arhat, and Completely Awakened One.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊知彼釋天心之所念，結加趺坐安處虛空。
translation: Knowing what the Bhagavān was thinking in the minds of those Śākyamuni gods, the Bhagavān then sat cross-legged and peacefully in space.

source_sentence: 是諸大眾以佛神力亦住空中，皆遙見彼妙喜世界不動如來及聲聞眾。
translation: Because of the Buddha's miraculous power, these masses were also standing in the air, and they all saw the Tathāgata Akṣobhya and the śrāvakas in that world of marvelous joy from a distance.

source_sentence: 眾皆見已，右膝著地向不動如來、應、正等覺。
translation: The assembly saw the Tathāgata, Arhat, and Completely Awakened One with their right knee touching the ground and facing forward without moving.

source_sentence: 爾時此界眾人皆作是念：「豈非三十三天為見彼佛而來集會禮拜供養？」
translation: It was then that the people in this world all thought, Isn't it because the Trāyastriṃśa gods gathered to venerate and make offerings to those buddhas in order to see them?

source_sentence: 是時帝釋作如是念：「彼界諸天以人相而住，我見彼諸人等服玩資具與彼諸天無少優劣。」
translation: Śakra then had this thought, The gods of that realm live with human forms, and I see that those people are no different from the gods in terms of clothing, playthings, and necessities.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊攝神通已，告天帝言：「彼諸人民皆受天樂，汝應愛樂。
translation: After the Bhagavān had gathered his supernormal powers, he addressed Indra, saying, All those people will experience heavenly bliss, and you should enjoy it.

source_sentence: 是諸人等見彼如來及愛樂彼受天資具者，彼諸眾生從餘世界命終以後，
translation: Those sentient beings who see the Tathāgata and delight in his heavenly provisions will be reborn in other worlds after their lives end.

translation: They'll all attain rebirth in the Akṣobhya Buddha-stage.

source_sentence: 爾時舍利弗告帝釋言：「汝見釋迦牟尼佛及不動如來，由此緣故，汝於此身得大善利，
translation: It was then that Śāriputra said to the lord of the gods: You see, O Śākyamuni Buddha and Akṣobhya Tathāgata! Because of this causality you have attained a great reward for yourself in this body.

source_sentence: 況汝已得過人之法。」
translation: How could it be that you've already attained the teaching of surpassing people?

source_sentence: 時天帝釋作如是念：「彼諸眾生聞此法門亦得善利，何況得生不動佛剎。」
translation: Śakra then had this thought, Those sentient beings who hear this teaching will also attain good benefits, so why wouldn't they attain birth in the Akṣobhya Buddha's buddha-stage?

source_sentence: 爾時佛告天帝釋言：「彼菩薩乘人當生彼佛剎者亦得善利。
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed Śakra Devānām-Indra, saying, That bodhisattva vehicle person who will be born in that buddha-stage will also attain good benefits.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 彼諸菩薩皆應得住不退轉故。
translation: It's because all those bodhisattvas should be able to abide in nonretrogression.

source_sentence: 若餘菩薩於其現身願生彼佛國者，應知皆是住不退轉。」
translation: If other bodhisattvas wish to be born in that Buddha's land in their present body, they should know that they are all abiding and not regressing.

source_sentence: 佛說此法門時，五百比丘於無漏法心得解脫；
translation: When the Buddha had taught this teaching, five hundred bhikṣus attained liberation of mind regarding the pure doctrine.

source_sentence: 五千菩薩、六千比丘尼、八千優婆塞、十千優婆夷及欲界中無量天子，
translation: 5,000 bodhisattvas, 6,000 nuns, 8,000 laymen, 10,000 laymen, and measureless celestial beings in the realm of desire.

source_sentence: 於彼佛剎皆願受生。
translation: In those buddha bases, they all wish to be born.

source_sentence: 如來是時皆與授記，於彼佛剎當獲往生。
translation: The Tathāgata then gave them all a prediction that they would be reborn in that Buddha's buddha-stage.

source_sentence: 若餘有情當願生者，如來亦當與記生彼佛剎。
translation: If other sentient beings wish to be born, the Tathāgata will also give assurance that they'll be born in that Buddha's buddha-stage.

source_sentence: 是時三千大千世界六種震動，所謂動、遍動、等遍動，搖、遍搖、等遍搖，
translation: At that time the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds shook in six ways, which are called trembling, quaking everywhere, and so forth, shaking, quaking everywhere, and so forth.

source_sentence: 震、遍震、等遍震，由此法門所加持故。
translation: trembling, pervasive trembling and equally pervasive trembling are supported by this doctrine.

source_sentence: 佛說此經已，舍利弗等，及諸世間天、人、阿修羅、乾闥婆、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽，
translation: After the Buddha had taught this sutra, Śāriputra and so forth, as well as the gods, humans, asuras, gandharvas, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, and mahoragas of the world.

source_sentence: 聞佛所說，皆大歡喜，信受奉行。
translation: Having heard the Buddha’s exhortation, they all rejoiced greatly and accepted it with faith.
